A

B

beforeEach(ExtensionContext) - Method in class com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging.junit.jupiter.LoggingExtension
Creates a stub for each field of the test instance that is of type Handler and is annotated with MockLogger.

C

com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging - package com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging
Stubbing for Java Standard Edition loggers.

Hamcrest matcher for records from a Java Standard Edition logger.

JUnit Jupiter extension to manage the replacement of Java Standard Edition loggers.

Support for replacing handlers using Mockito.

M

It matches if, and only if, all requirements are satisfied.

S

SomeLogRecordMatcher - Class in com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging.hamcrest
Hamcrest matcher for a log record.
stubFor(String, Handler) - Static method in class com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging.LoggerStub
Creates a stub for the logger with the given name and replaces its handlers with the specified handler.
supportsParameter(ParameterContext, ExtensionContext) - Method in class com.github.codeteapot.testing.logging.junit.jupiter.LoggingExtension
